description: Conjecturally largest even integer which is an unordered sum of two primes in exactly n ways.
comments: The Goldbach conjecture is that every even number is the sum of two primes.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
example: 2 is largest even integer which is the sum of two primes in 0 ways, 12 is largest even integer which is the unordered sum of two primes in 1 way (5+7), etc.
author: _Bill Gosper_
